body:
This PR is a partial fix for #21454 (see #22281 for the complete fix for the `bitcoind` compatibility).

The suggested implementation does not work for ARM hosts.

title: build: Avoid fcntl64@GLIBC_2.28 symbol when --enable-glibc-back-compat
